title.rendered: OSTIF’s 2017 Open Books Have Been Updated

content.rendered:
OSTIF’s 2017 Open Books Have Been Updated

Our commitment to keep our financial transactions fully transparent continues. We have updated our public books to current.

You can view them here: https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1OqWBlNwk5be2c74cRlmYOdhLWPeCjCBAALxYCdMwIaM/

Our biggest items of note in 2017 so far are the donations and expenses related to the OpenVPN 2.4 fundraiser.

You can view the results of the OpenVPN audit here: https://ostif.org/the-openvpn-2-4-0-audit-by-ostif-and-quarkslab-results/

Our current endowment stands at $43,479.56 at the time of this posting.

Our next major event will be the fundraiser for OpenSSL 1.1.1, the details of which will be announced in the near future.
